creator: jon@latchkey.com
text:
I am using the latest CVS as of right now (which reports)

Starting service Tomcat-Standalone
Apache Tomcat/4.0-b8-dev

2001-08-12 22:20:30,061 [Thread-3] INFO  default - 
org.apache.fulcrum.ServiceExc
eption: Shutdown of a nonexistent class 
org.apache.fulcrum.factory.TurbineFactor
yService was requested: ServiceBroker: unknown service 
org.apache.fulcrum.factor
y.TurbineFactoryService requested
2001-08-12 22:20:30,065 [Thread-3] INFO  default - 
org.apache.fulcrum.Instantiat
ionException: ServiceBroker: unknown service 
org.apache.fulcrum.factory.TurbineF
actoryService requested
        at

r
oker.java:677)
        at

er.
java:375)
        at

ke
r.java:563)
        at

ok
er.java:599)

:
991)

1

2351)
        at

a:1312)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:496)
rethrown as org.apache.fulcrum.ServiceException: Shutdown of a 
nonexistent class
 org.apache.fulcrum.factory.TurbineFactoryService was requested:

unknown service org.apache.fulcrum.factory.TurbineFactoryService 
requested
        at

er.
java:386)
        at 
org.apache.fulcrum.BaseServiceBroker.shutdownService(BaseServiceBro
ke
r.java:563)
        at

ok
er.java:599)

:
991)
        at

1

2351)

a:1312)

Turned out to be an application problem.
creator: craig.mcclanahan@sun.com
